name: Metatron's Library
description:
Explore a surreal mysterious tower in the middle of an ocean, while trying to uncover the truth of Nyx and Priscilla's past.

Two factions of angels wage war around you in the Library of Metatron. The Watchers have come back to take revenge for the flood which killed most of their Nephilim children. Grow your team as you traverse deeper and deeper into the library and farther into the incredibly exotic world, where things slowly lose their color and become monochrome. Try to keep Nyx and Priscilla alive while trying to get them home in this surreal, 3D, adventure RPG!

Big thanks to: Luvcore and Selhoa for making some of the soundtrack!
